original_title: Guns N’ Roses The Classic Transmissions
overview: Featuring both rare and classic archive performance footage of prime-era Guns N’ Roses in concert, drawn from their 1988 - 1993 period, this DVD contains more than 100 minutes of the band during their ‘first wave’. With all film taken from television broadcast programs, this collection fulfills a long held demand from fans for just such a release.
title: Guns N’ Roses The Classic Transmissions
